pageTitle: Two and a Half Men - Season 7, Episode 21: Gumby with a Pokey - TV.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {55612=Released: 2009, 14946=International Airdates: Australia: May 24, 2010 on Channel 9 Latin America: May 25, 2010 on Warner Channel Sweden: August 6, 2010 on TV 3 Slovakia: November 26, 2010 on Markiza}
textBeforeTable: EDIT Cast & Crew: STARS See All Fan Reviews Permalink Twitter Facebook Hide Share Flag 1 4 DO YOU AGREE? Apart from the ridiculous scene with Alan and Jake having a fart contest (someone must have watched the Peter/Michael Moore one from Family Guy on YouTube) this was a pretty good episode of Two and a Half Men. The end sequence, while predictable was still a great moment, and the scene with Martin Mull returning as the pharmacist produced about eight truly laugh out loud moments. Mull's been all over TV the past few years on Gary Unmarried, Til Death and this program and hopefully he gets some more work next year, with the former two now canceled. It was a nice touch getting a lot of Charlie's past girlfriends for this high sequence. Good way to close out a pretty tumultuous year for the show.moreless thefanof, Jun 05, 2010 By 7.8 gumby with a poker
